scenes.action_text: THE BIG SICK Written by Emily V. Gordon & Kumail Nanjiani 1 OVER BLACK. We hear audience laughter. ANDY DODD (V.O.) Give it up for my man, Mr. Kumail Nanjiani! KUMAIL (V.O.) Hello. I grew up in Pakistan. And people are always asking me, what was that like? Really not that different from here. I mean we played cricket, which is just a spicier versi
